data.name: Pixel Combat
data.detailed_description: This is a 2D pixel adventure game. You can choose one of the two heroes to start your adventure. The level room and scene elements in the game world are randomly generated. You can experience different feelings every time you enter. Players can move up, down, left, right and attack to eliminate monsters, obtain spoils, constantly improve their ability, and finally become a strong brave.
data.about_the_game: This is a 2D pixel adventure game. You can choose one of the two heroes to start your adventure. The level room and scene elements in the game world are randomly generated. You can experience different feelings every time you enter. Players can move up, down, left, right and attack to eliminate monsters, obtain spoils, constantly improve their ability, and finally become a strong brave.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: DualCore 1.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore 2.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
